item.title: Make your mark on the Aurora Bridge Art Project
item.description: If you are as excited about the ongoing art project on the Aurora Pedestrian Bridge as we are, you will be thrilled to hear there is now an opportunity to meet neighbors and help enhance the project! This coming weekend (Saturday the 17th and Sunday the 18th), neighbors will be …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley

item.title: Vibrant Art Coming Soon to Aurora Ave N Pedestrian Bridge
item.description: The Aurora Ave N corridor is about to see some welcome color and vibrancy on its pedestrian bridge at N 102nd St. Crews will be focused on cleaning and painting the pedestrian bridge through the next three weeks. The pedestrian bridge will be open during cleaning and painting, although a …
item.dc:creator: amandacrosley

item.title: Outlines Provide Sneak Peak of Street Improvements
item.description: A friend of the blog dropped a hint letting us know that a new traffic circle has been outlined for N 97th and Wallingford Ave N, which SDOT plans on having completed this summer! The circle will be a very welcome addition to the area, as, despite lots of warning …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
